Title: Media Lync
Description: A small WPF application which broadcasts the song you are currently playing in Microsoft Zune Player for Windows as your personal note in Microsoft Lync 2010.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A small WPF application which broadcasts the song you are currently playing in Microsoft Zune Player for Windows as your personal note in Microsoft Lync 2010.

Project Status

This project is still in development and therefore has no release as yet. A release is expected Summer 2011, however if you can't wait that long feel free to download the source for yourself and follow the Pre-release guide

Project Dependencies

Please note that this project depends on the following codeplex projects:
  • Zune - Now Playing (http://znp.codeplex.com)
